Seven qualities that a mendicant must po: Truly understanding internally constricted mind as "internally constricted mind"
Truly understanding externally scattered mind as "externally scattered mind"
Knowing feelings as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
Knowing perceptions as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
Knowing thoughts as they arise, as they remain, and as they go away
